entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've managed to find survivors but that is just the beginning.
entries.journal_entry_description: Use the command console to see if there are any clues.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: [Guri] Looks like Dr. Jin took the only unmutated sample. Maybe his body is around here somewhere.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Search the bodies in this office. Maybe Jin's body is here.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Hello? Come in?  Is someone there? Please help us.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Use the command console in Doctor Jin's office
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Our console is damaged. If possible, I need you to shut down the facility ventillation. I repeat, use the console to stop the virus from venting topside.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Use the command console to shut off the emergency ventillation.
